script.name: al.Phanon.Task.TLStation
script.description: LitQB's Phanon Corporation: Assigns TL ship to drop station at random sector

line.comment: * if read text: page id=8384, id=410 exists
* * Phanon prioritizes having a minimum of 1 station in its claimed territory
* * write to player logbook: printf: fmt='Phanon found %s in owned sector', $Station, $Value, $Value, $Value, $Value
* * write to player logbook: printf: fmt='Phanon priotized building in %s. Existing stations %s', $TargetSector, $Phanon.Stations, $Value, $Value, $Value
* write to player logbook: printf: fmt='Phanon vs %s notoriety is %s (TLStation)', $Race,$Notoriety, $Value, $Value, $Value
* write to player logbook: printf: fmt='Adding %s energy to %s', $NewStationEnergyTransfer,$Station, $Value, $Value, $Value
* won't wait for HQ to generate more, immediately buy some more

sval.val: LitQB's Phanon Corporation: Assigns TL ship to drop station at random sector
if read text: page id=8384, id=410 exists
* Phanon prioritizes having a minimum of 1 station in its claimed territory
* write to player logbook: printf: fmt='Phanon found %s in owned sector', $Station, $Value, $Value, $Value, $Value
* write to player logbook: printf: fmt='Phanon priotized building in %s. Existing stations %s', $TargetSector, $Phanon.Stations, $Value, $Value, $Value
write to player logbook: printf: fmt='Phanon vs %s notoriety is %s (TLStation)', $Race,$Notoriety, $Value, $Value, $Value
write to player logbook: printf: fmt='Adding %s energy to %s', $NewStationEnergyTransfer,$Station, $Value, $Value, $Value
won't wait for HQ to generate more, immediately buy some more
